GamePlay
Class CollisionManager

java.lang.Object
  GamePlay.CollisionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CollisionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Used to control the logic behind all types of collision detection that take place during game play, specifically collision between: - Player and enemies, player and walls, player and powerUp, player and Door, player and flames, and player and bombs. - Enemies and walls, player and flames, enemies and flames, and enemies and bombs. It also control the logic required for resolving collisions.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

CollisionManager

public CollisionManager(Player player,
                        TileMap tileMap,
                        java.lang.String userName)
Initializes a CollisionManager object, containing the entities to be tested for collisions.

Parameters:
player - A player object used to determine the collisions between players and enemies. Also note that it contains the bombs that have placed on the grid.
tileMap - A tileMap object containing the walls, powerUp, door, and flames present on the grid.
userName - The username of the current player.
Method Detail

handleCollisions

public void handleCollisions(GameObject[][] objects,
                             java.awt.Rectangle playerRectangle,
                             java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies,
                             java.util.ArrayList<Bomb> bombsPlaced,
                             java.util.ArrayList<Flame> flames,
                             PowerUp powerUp,
                             Door door,
                             boolean isBonusStage)
Fundamental function of the collision manager used to trigger the logic necessary to resolve all the collisions between the objects present on the grid.

Parameters:
objects - Two dimensional array containing the wall objects present on the grid.
playerRectangle - The Rectangle object specifying the bounds of the player object.
enemies - ArrayList containing the enemy objects present on the grid.
bombsPlaced - An ArrayList containing the bombs objects placed on the grid.
flames - An ArrayList containing the flame objects present on the grid.
powerUp - The powerUp object present on the grid.
door - The door object present on the grid.
isBonusStage - A boolean specifying whether the current stage is a bonus stage or not.

checkCollisionsWithWalls

public void checkCollisionsWithWalls(GameObject[][] objects,
                                     java.awt.Rectangle playerRectangle,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies)
Determines whether the enemies or the player are colliding with a wall or not. If a collision occurs, it calls the necessary logic to resolve it.

Parameters:
objects - A two dimensional array containing the walls present in the game.
playerRectangle - The rectangle representing the collision box of the player object.
enemies - An ArrayList containing the enemy objects present in the game.

checkCollisionWithPowerUp

public void checkCollisionWithPowerUp(java.awt.Rectangle playerRectangle,
                                      PowerUp powerUp)
Determines whether the player is colliding with a powerUp. If this is the case, it enables the powerUp attribute on the player object.

Parameters:
playerRectangle - The rectangle representing the collision box of the player object.
powerUp - The powerUp object present on the grid.

checkCollisionWithDoor

public void checkCollisionWithDoor(java.awt.Rectangle playerRectangle,
                                   Door door,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies)
Check collisions between the player and the door object. If a collision occurs, we advance to the next stage.

Parameters:
playerRectangle - The rectangle representing the collision box of the player object.
door - The door object present on the grid.
enemies - An ArrayList containing the enemy objects present in the game.

checkCollisionsWithBombs

public void checkCollisionsWithBombs(java.util.ArrayList<Bomb> bombsPlaced,
                                     java.awt.Rectangle playerRectangle,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies)
Checks collisions between the player and the bomb objects, as well as enemies and the bomb object. Note that by bomb we are not referring to the flames from the explosion, but rather the bomb itself before it blows up.

Parameters:
bombsPlaced - An ArrayList containing the bombs objects placed on the grid.
playerRectangle - The rectangle representing the collision box of the player object.
enemies - An ArrayList containing the enemy objects present in the game.

checkCollisionsWithFlames

public void checkCollisionsWithFlames(java.util.ArrayList<Bomb> bombsPlaced,
                                      java.awt.Rectangle playerRectangle,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<Flame> flames,
                                      PowerUp powerUp,
                                      Door door,
                                      boolean isBonusStage)
Checks collision between the player, enemies, door and powerUp with the flames objects that result from a bomb blast.

Parameters:
bombsPlaced - An ArrayList containing the bombs objects placed on the grid.
playerRectangle - The Rectangle object specifying the bounds of the player object.
enemies - An ArrayList containing the enemy objects present in the game.
flames - An ArrayList containing the flame objects present on the grid.
powerUp - The powerUp object present on the grid.
door - The door object present on the grid.
isBonusStage - A boolean specifying whether the current stage is a bonus stage or not.

checkCollisionsBetweenFlameAndPlayer

public void checkCollisionsBetweenFlameAndPlayer(java.awt.Rectangle flameRectangle,
                                                 java.awt.Rectangle playerRectangle,
                                                 boolean isBonusStage)
Resolves collisions between the player object and a flame object.

Parameters:
flameRectangle - The rectangle representing the collision box of the flame object.
playerRectangle - The rectangle representing the collision box of the player object.
isBonusStage - A boolean specifying whether the current stage is a bonus stage or not.

checkCollisionsBetweenFlameAndBomb

public void checkCollisionsBetweenFlameAndBomb(java.awt.Rectangle flameRectangle,
                                               java.util.ArrayList<Bomb> bombsPlaced)
Resolves the collisions between the bomb objects and a flame object.

Parameters:
flameRectangle - The rectangle representing the collision box of the flame object.
bombsPlaced - An ArrayList containing the bombs objects placed on the grid.

checkCollisionsBetweenFlameAndEnemies

public void checkCollisionsBetweenFlameAndEnemies(java.awt.Rectangle flameRectangle,
                                                  Flame flame,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<KillSet> enemiesKilled)
Resolves the collisions between the enemy objects and a flame object.

Parameters:
flameRectangle - The rectangle representing the collision box of the flame object.
flame - The flame object being tested for collision.
enemies - ArrayList containing the enemy objects present on the grid.
enemiesKilled - ArrayList used to keep track of the enemies killed. Used for score management.

checkCollisionsBetweenFlameAndPowerUp

public void checkCollisionsBetweenFlameAndPowerUp(java.awt.Rectangle flameRectangle,
                                                  PowerUp powerUp,
                                                  boolean isBonusStage)

Parameters:
flameRectangle - The rectangle representing the collision box of the flame object.
powerUp - The powerUp object present on the grid.
isBonusStage - A boolean specifying whether the current stage is a bonus stage or not.

checkCollisionsBetweenFlameAndDoor

                                               Door door,
                                               boolean isBonusStage)
Resolves the collision between the door object and a flame object.

Parameters:
flameRectangle - The rectangle representing the collision box of the flame object.
door - The door object present on the grid.
isBonusStage - A boolean specifying whether the current stage is a bonus stage or not.

checkCollisionsWithEnemies

public void checkCollisionsWithEnemies(java.awt.Rectangle playerRectangle,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies)
Checks collision between the player and the enemies present in the grid. If a collision does occur, the player death method is called.

Parameters:
playerRectangle - The rectangle representing the collision box of the player object.
enemies - ArrayList containing the enemy objects present on the grid.

spawnSetOfHarderEnemies

public void spawnSetOfHarderEnemies(int posX,
                                    int posY)
Spawns a set of enemies one difficulty type higher than the hardest enemy present on the grid.

Parameters:
posX - x coordinate where the harder enemies will spawn.
posY - y coordinate where the harder enemies will spawn.

restoreToBeforeCollision

public void restoreToBeforeCollision(MovableObject object,
                                     java.awt.Rectangle obstacleRectangle)
Restores the position of the object passed such that it doesn't collide with the rectangle object passed. This method is called when the player or the enemies collide with walls and bombs.

Parameters:
object - The object that is in collision with the obstacle Rectangle.
obstacleRectangle - The collision box of the obstacle the object is colliding with.
